name: DreamYnn
description:
Dreamynn is a game about managing the Inn of Dreams, where people come to have the best dreams of their life. Protect them from nightmares and they will be generous when they wake up.
This is a prototype created by a "two people team" during a private jam.

Game Controls :

  • Drag'n drop,
  • Left mouse clic

Current Available Platforms :

  • PC

Team Members :

Raphael Da Costa : Designer / Artist

Maxime Blandin : Developer / Artist

Music by Auriplane

Engine : Game Maker Studio
